name: In re Nomination Petition of Jess JOHNSON, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 192nd Legislative District at the April 26, 2016 Democratic Primary Election. Appeal of Morgan Cephas
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Johnson

judges: BEFORE: SAYLOR, C.J., BAER, TODD, DONOHUE, DOUGHERTY, WECHT, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Jess JOHNSON, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 192nd Legislative District at the April 26, 2016 Democratic Primary Election. Appeal of Morgan Cephas.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of April, 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kathleen Marie Kotula, PA Dept, of State, for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation, Participants.
Robert Thomas Vance Jr., Law Offices of Robert T. Vance, Jr., Philadelphia, for Morgan Cephas, Appellant.
Zachary Cryder Shaffer, Montoya Shaffer, LLC, for Jess Johnson, Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
134 A.3d 1042
In re Nomination Petition of Jess JOHNSON, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 192nd Legislative District at the April 26, 2016 Democratic Primary Election. Appeal of Morgan Cephas.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 8, 2016.
Kathleen Marie Kotula, PA Dept, of State, for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation, Participants.
